named-query.name: FIND_CHANGESET_BY_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT cs FROM ChangeSetImpl cs WHERE cs.objectGroupId = ?1

named-query.name: FIND_CHANGESETS_BY_GUIDS
named-query.query: SELECT cs FROM ChangeSetImpl cs WHERE cs.objectGroupId IN (?1)

named-query.name: SELECT_ALL_CHANGESETS_BY_USERGUID
named-query.query: SELECT cs FROM ChangeSetImpl cs, IN(cs.assignedUsers) a WHERE a.userGuid = ?1 ORDER BY cs.name, cs.createdDate

named-query.name: DELETE_CHANGESET_BY_GUID
named-query.query: DELETE FROM ChangeSetImpl cs WHERE cs.objectGroupId = ?1

named-query.name: SELECT_ALL_CHANGESETS
named-query.query: SELECT cs FROM ChangeSetImpl cs ORDER BY cs.name, cs.createdDate

named-query.name: FIND_AVAILABLE_CHANGESETUSERS
named-query.query: SELECT NEW com.elasticpath.domain.changeset.ChangeSetUserView(cm.firstName, cm.lastName, cm.userName, cm.guid) FROM CmUserImpl cm, IN(cm.userRoles) ur, IN(ur.userPermissions) up WHERE up.authority IN (:list)

named-query.name: FIND_AVAILABLE_SUPERUSERS
named-query.query: SELECT NEW com.elasticpath.domain.changeset.ChangeSetUserView(cm.firstName, cm.lastName, cm.userName, cm.guid) FROM CmUserImpl cm, IN(cm.userRoles) ur WHERE ur.name = ?1

named-query.name: FIND_ALL_AVAILABLE_CHANGESETUSERS
named-query.query: SELECT NEW com.elasticpath.domain.changeset.ChangeSetUserView(cm.firstName, cm.lastName, cm.userName, cm.guid) FROM CmUserImpl cm

named-query.name: FIND_CHANGESETUSERVIEWS_BY_GUIDS
named-query.query: SELECT NEW com.elasticpath.domain.changeset.ChangeSetUserView(cm.firstName, cm.lastName, cm.userName, cm.guid) FROM CmUserImpl cm WHERE cm.guid IN (?1)

named-query.name: FIND_CHANGESET_GUID_BY_LIST_OF_GUIDS_AND_STATES
named-query.query: SELECT cs.objectGroupId FROM ChangeSetImpl cs WHERE cs.stateCodeName IN (?1) AND cs.objectGroupId IN (?2)

named-query.name: DELETE_GROUP_MEMBER_BY_OBJ_TYPE_AND_ID_AND_GROUP_ID
named-query.query: DELETE FROM BusinessObjectGroupMemberImpl gm WHERE gm.objectType = ?1 AND gm.objectIdentifier = ?2 AND gm.groupId = ?3

named-query.name: DELETE_MEMBERS_BY_GROUP_ID
named-query.query: DELETE FROM BusinessObjectGroupMemberImpl gm WHERE gm.groupId = ?1

named-query.name: FIND_OBJECT_MEMBERS_BY_GROUPID
named-query.query: SELECT gm FROM BusinessObjectGroupMemberImpl gm WHERE gm.groupId = ?1

named-query.name: FIND_OBJECT_MEMBER_BY_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT gm FROM BusinessObjectGroupMemberImpl gm WHERE gm.guid = ?1

named-query.name: GROUP_MEMBER_EXISTS_BY_OBJ_TYPE_AND_ID
named-query.query: SELECT gm.uidPk FROM BusinessObjectGroupMemberImpl gm WHERE gm.objectType = ?1 AND gm.objectIdentifier = ?2

named-query.name: FIND_GROUP_IDS_BY_OBJ_TYPE_AND_ID
named-query.query: SELECT gm.groupId FROM BusinessObjectGroupMemberImpl gm WHERE gm.objectType = ?1 AND gm.objectIdentifier = ?2

named-query.name: FIND_OBJECT_MEMBER_BY_OBJ_TYPE_AND_ID
named-query.query: SELECT gm FROM BusinessObjectGroupMemberImpl gm WHERE gm.objectType = ?1 AND gm.objectIdentifier = ?2

named-query.name: UPDATE_CHANGESETOBJECTS_FOR_GUIDS
named-query.query: UPDATE BusinessObjectGroupMemberImpl bog SET bog.groupId = ?1 WHERE bog.groupId = ?2 AND bog.objectType = ?3 AND bog.objectIdentifier = ?4

named-query.name: COUNT_MEMBERS_BY_GROUP_ID
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(gm) FROM BusinessObjectGroupMemberImpl gm WHERE gm.groupId = ?1

named-query.name: COUNT_FILTERED_MEMBERS_BY_GROUP_ID
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(gm) FROM BusinessObjectGroupMemberImpl gm WHERE gm.groupId = ?1 AND gm.objectType NOT IN (?2)

named-query.name: FIND_OBJECT_METADATA_BY_GROUPID
named-query.query: SELECT bom FROM BusinessObjectMetadataImpl bom WHERE bom.businessObjectGroupMember.groupId = ?1

named-query.name: FIND_OBJECT_METADATA_BY_OBJ_TYPE_AND_ID
named-query.query: SELECT bom FROM BusinessObjectMetadataImpl bom WHERE bom.businessObjectGroupMember.objectType = ?1 AND bom.businessObjectGroupMember.objectIdentifier = ?2

named-query.name: FIND_OBJECT_METADATA_BY_GROUPID_OBJ_TYPE_AND_ID
named-query.query: SELECT bom FROM BusinessObjectMetadataImpl bom WHERE bom.businessObjectGroupMember.groupId = ?1 AND bom.businessObjectGroupMember.objectType = ?2 AND bom.businessObjectGroupMember.objectIdentifier = ?3

named-query.name: DELETE_OBJECT_METADATA_BY_OBJ_TYPE_AND_ID_AND_GROUP_ID
named-query.query: DELETE FROM BusinessObjectMetadataImpl bom WHERE bom.businessObjectGroupMember.objectType = ?1 AND bom.businessObjectGroupMember.objectIdentifier = ?2 AND bom.businessObjectGroupMember.groupId = ?3

named-query.name: DELETE_OBJECT_METADATA_BY_GROUP_ID
named-query.query: DELETE FROM BusinessObjectMetadataImpl bom WHERE bom.businessObjectGroupMember.groupId = ?1

named-query.name: FIND_OBJECT_METADATA_BY_GROUPID_AND_KEY
named-query.query: SELECT bom FROM BusinessObjectMetadataImpl bom WHERE bom.businessObjectGroupMember.groupId = ?1 AND bom.metadataKey = ?2

named-query.name: FIND_CHANGE_SET_EXISTS_BY_STATE_AND_CHANGE_SET_NAME
named-query.query: SELECT 1 FROM ChangeSetImpl csi WHERE csi.name = :changeSetName AND csi.stateCodeName IN :changeSetStates
